channel.title: Can't confirm Wiki e-mail adress
channel.description:
Whenever i try to activate my account i get this error: [quote] Internal error[/size]
Set [b]$wgShowExceptionDetails = true;[/b] at the bottom of LocalSettings.php to show detailed debugging information. [/quote] Tried on Google Chrome and Edge.

item.title: Can't confirm Wiki e-mail adress
item.dc:creator: araghon007
item.description:
Whenever i try to activate my account i get this error:

Internal error[/size]

Set $wgShowExceptionDetails = true; at the bottom of LocalSettings.php to show detailed debugging information.

Tried on Google Chrome and Edge.
